title: Insecure FTP Configuration
description: Explore and exploit common FTP misconfigurations to retrieve a flag stored on the server.
hints: Consider the implications of weak or default FTP passwords.
Check if directory permissions allow unauthorized access.
Use FTP tools in Kali Linux to enumerate directories and files.
learningObjectives: Learn how to exploit FTP misconfigurations.
Understand the significance of secure FTP credentials.
